title: Assassin future Rework: Akali suggestion
body:
So i am exciting about the assassin rework coming in the future and i just want to suggestion some idea for akali. 

Here the thing i am hoping the y fix with akali from the rework make her have a better early game. Imo that the thing i always hated about akali is her early game and how much she need her ultimate.

**New passive:**

**Twin Disciplines:**
**1) Discipline by Force:** Fuse her old passive together has one need to be balance.

2) **new** **Discipline by Shadow**: After landing 3-5 auto attack akali can become stealth for 3sec and gain 50% movement.

**Rework Q**

Mark of the Assassin: Akali throw her Kama at a targeted location and she can click on it to teleport to it. If she hit an enemy the kama will be stuck to them and when she teleport it will refresh the cooldown by half. It a skill shoot!

i just thought it would be cool if she was like the yellow flash from naruto being able to teleport to your weapon would be nice also this would still help her farm.

**Rework W**

**Shadow Dance:** Just change her old w with her ultimate re balance it and make us able to use it 2x instead of 3.

**New ultimate** 

_Twight Assault:_ Active when activaited Akali place down a smokescreen that cover a 1100 range and last 10 sec. While in the shroud akali passive is increase and she can be stealth. Any enemy in it will be slowed.


What you guys think about these suggestion for {{champion:84}}

So I am excited about the assassin rework coming in the future, and just want to suggest some ideas for Akali.

The thing I am hoping they fix for Akali with the rework is to make her have a better early game.  The thing I always hated about Akali is her early game, and how much she needs her ultimate.

New passive:

Twin Disciplines:
1) Discipline by Force: Both parts of her old passive combined.

2) new: Discipline by Shadow: After landing 3-5 auto attacks, Akali can enter stealth for 3sec and gain 50% movement.

Rework Q:

Mark of the Assassin: Akali throw her Kama at a targeted location, and can click on it to teleport to it. If she hit an enemy, the kama will be stuck to them, and when she teleports to it, the cooldown will be refreshed by half. It's a skill shot!

i just thought it would be cool if she was like the yellow flash from Naruto, able to teleport to her weapon.  It would also be nice as this would still help her farm.

Rework W:

Shadow Dance: Just switch her old w with her ultimate, re-balance it, and make her able to hold 2 charges instead of 3.

New ultimate:

Twight Assault: Akali place down a smokescreen that cover a 1100 range and lasts 10 sec. While in the shroud, Akali is in stealth and her passive is increased. Any enemy in the smokescreen is slowed.

What you guys think about these suggestion for {{champion:84}} ?


I do not mean to be at all rude, but it was a bit difficult to read.  I think this will make it a bit easier for everyone.  If you can tell me what you meant with the first part of her passive, I'll edit this to properly reflect that.

This is akali old passive it basicially 2 effect in one. What i was saying is combine Discipline of Force and might into one.

**Old Passive**

DISCIPLINE OF FORCE: Akali's basic attacks deal 6% 「 (+ 1% per 6 AP) 」「 (+ 16.667% per 100 AP) 」 of her AD as bonus on-hit magic damage.
DISCIPLINE OF MIGHT: Akali permanently has 6% 「 (+ 1% per 6 bonus AD) 」「 (+ 16.667% per 100 bonus AD) 」 spell vamp.

**New Passive**

Discipline of Force: Old passive effect has one effect
Discipline of Shadow: After 6 auto attack akali become stealth for 3 sec and gain a burst of movement
Riot also stated that Akali is one of the minor reworks, with tweaks instead of big changes because she is in need for relaunch level work in the semi near future (they guessed a year or two).

Riot already stated long ago they won't make Akali's shroud her ultimate, since it's a non-damaging ability meaning she would essentially unlock her full damage combo at lvl 3, and she wouldn't be cooldown gated on her burst like Zed/Talon with their ult cds.

But what riot stated now is that they want assassin to have a delay on their burst and they want them to have an impact for the team.

With this new shroud it would impact team fight more because its a cc slow
